lines.text:
[holding a dish of food]
Here duck duck duck duck duck! Come and get your breakfast.
[Daffy eats everything, including the dish, up to Elmer's arm]
Don't eat my arm off. Tsk tsk, I never saw anyone so greedy!

[swallows the food and dish]
Quack quack?
Now you've had enough. I never saw such a greedy pig.
